text: Stonewielder is the third fantasy novel by Canadian author Ian Cameron Esslemont set in the world of the Malazan Book of the Fallen, co-created with Esslemont's friend and colleague Steven Erikson. Stonewielder is the third of six novels by Esslemont to take place in the Malazan world. ==References== Category:2010 Canadian novels Category:High fantasy novels Category:Novels of the Malazan Empire Category:Canadian fantasy novels
title: Stonewielder
